import { useContext } from "react" import "./CartListSummary.css" import { CartContext } from "../../contexts/CartContext" export const CartListSummary = () => { const {cart} = useContext(CartContext) const cartItemsTotal = cart.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr.quantity, 0); return (
